name: expo-web-sqlite
description: Basically the same as `expo-sqlite` but `WebSQLDatabase` isn't deprecated in favor of the experimental, silent-erroring SQLiteDatabase. Provides access to a database that can be queried through a WebSQL-like API (https://www.w3.org/TR/webdatabase/). The database is persisted across restarts of your app.
author: Ovikx
